question: Which country was invaded by the United Kingdom and the Soviet Union in 1941 through "Operation Countenance"?
explanation: Iran was invaded by the United Kingdom and the Soviet Union in 1941 through "Operation Countenance". The Anglo-Soviet invasion of Iran or the Anglo-Soviet invasion of Persia was the joint invasion of the neutral Imperial State of Iran by the United Kingdom and the Soviet Union in August 1941. The invasion, codenamed Operation Countenance, was largely unopposed by the numerically and technologically inferior Iranian forces.
